data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Cimişlia
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cimişlia, Moldova
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Cimişlia, Moldova. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Cimişlia to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 2,277 believers in Cimişlia.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Cimişlia to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Cimişlia, Moldova so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Cimişlia with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cimişlia, Moldova has a population of 49,300.

We estimate Cimişlia has 2,277 people who might know Jesus, 34,935 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 12,089 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.
